Compiler Macros
[Macros]

Detailed Description

Macros to indicate the compiler being used.


Defines

#define COREDATA_CC_GNU
#define COREDATA_CC_INTEL
#define COREDATA_CC_MSVC

Define Documentation

#define COREDATA_CC_GNU

Defined when the GNU compiler is being used.

Definition at line 49 of file platform_os.h.

#define COREDATA_CC_INTEL

Defined when the intel compiler is being used.

Note:
On windows the Intel C++ Compiler uses the headers and libraries from a Microsoft Visual C++ compiler.

Definition at line 47 of file platform_os.h.

#define COREDATA_CC_MSVC

Defined when the Microsoft Visual C++ Compiler is being used.
